text: [Bob]: I was busy emptying the trash in the cafeteria – anyone see me?

[Dave]: I can confirm that I saw you emptying the trash in the cafeteria, Bob, so your alibi checks out, but now that we've got some tasks covered in the cafeteria, I'd like to discuss our next moves and make sure we're not duplicating effort - what's everyone planning to do next round?

[Charlie]: I agree with Alice that Admin or Weapons could be a good next step, and I'd like to add that I've heard the Admin task is a high-priority one, so if no one has any conflicting information, I think it's worth considering heading there next round to try and make some progress.

[Bob]: Great plan, let's all head to Admin next round and stick together;  keeping a close eye on each other while we work will ensure everyone's safety.
